name: Jony
description:
'''Jahid Afrail oglu Huseynli''' ({{Langx|az|Cahid Əfrail oğlu Hüseynli}}; {{langx|ru|Джахид Афраил оглы Гусейнли}}; born 29 February 1996), known professionally as '''Jony''', is an Azerbaijani-born Russian singer and songwriter. He is the winner of the second season of the Russian reality singing show ''[[The Masked Singer (Russian TV series)|The Masked Singer]]'' (2021) on [[NTV (Russia)|NTV]].

Winner of the [[Golden Gramophone Award]], Zhara Music Awards, [[Muz-TV]] and New Radio Awards. Winner of the 2023 [[Forbes 30 Under 30|30 Under 30 rating]] in the Music category.

In 2024, he became a coach on the [[The Voice Kids (Russian TV series) season 11|eleventh season]] of ''[[The Voice Kids (Russian TV series)|The Voice Kids]]''.
